Summary: White light Shot up and disappeared
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in White Plains
There were no other sightings in White Plains on or around March 20th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was Driving just getting onto the highway after 2am and i saw a white light Shoot straight up into the air on an angle at a extremely high speed it didnt seem to go very far then it dissappeared. the light was steady and bright. the upward angle was to the right from my field of view. This happened heading home from White Plain, NY on the ramp gettng onto 287 or whatever the main highway was. I was in disbelief and told the person that i was on the phone with what i just saw and asked them what it could be. they told me i just saw a UFO. I thought i had, but couldnt believe it. Please someone disprove me and tell me what else this could have been. i dont see how it could have been a sattellite, airplane, commet, or shoot star... it was moving too fast to be any kind or airplane and then just dissappeared after only being visible for a second or 2.
